## Add New Vendor Option (Selected)

When this operation is selected, a list of fields for data entry are displayed to the user. This information pertains to the new vendor and when captured, will be sent to the database side for retrieval and use at various other stages of the procurement process.
The fields on this page include:

| Field Name        | Description                                                                                         | Mandatory |
| ----------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- |
| Vendor Name       | Name of vendor                                                                                      | Yes       |
| Vendor Email      | Vendor email address                                                                                | Yes       |
| Contact Person    | Contact person                                                                                      | Yes       |
| Designation       | Contact person designation                                                                          | Yes       |
| Phone Number 1    | Vendor phone number                                                                                 | Yes       |
| Phone Number 2    | Vendor phone number                                                                                 | No        |
| Vendor Address    | Vendor Address                                                                                      | Yes       |
| FAX               | Vendor FAX                                                                                          | Yes       |
| Prequalified      | This field indicates whether or not this Vendor has passed all of EXIM Bank's criteria for vendors. | Yes       |
| Vendor Categories | This field is a table containing all categories this particular vendor falls under.                 | Yes       |

Once all the mandatory fields have been populated, the task form may be submitted. Upon submission of the form, the relevant database tables are populated and the new vendor's information is available for use in the _Procurement Process_.
